DataElement.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor AJCC Edition 8 Clinical Regional Lymph Node N Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for colon and rectal neuroendocrine tumor based on evidence obtained from the date of cancer diagnosis until the start of definitive treatment, or within four months (whichever is shorter), using AJCC Ed. 8 criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor Clinical N Category
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A well differentiated, low or intermediate grade tumor with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A well differentiated, low or intermediate grade tumor with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum.

Concepts.definition: A well differentiated, low, intermediate, or high grade neoplasm with neuroendocrine differentiation that arises from the colon or rectum.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:One criteria of the TMN staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: AJCC Based:Staging Criteria Based on American Joint Committee on Cancer System

ValueDomain.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor American Joint Committee on Cancer Edition 8 N Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A finding about one or more characteristics of a colorectal neuroendocrine tumor, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system. This classification system applies to colorectal "carcinoid" tumors (neuroendocrine tumor G1 and G2, and rare-well differentiated G3). It does not apply to high-grade neuroendocrine carcinomas and mixed adenoneuroendocrine carcinomas of the colon and rectum. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)_A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pNX TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pNX TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Colorectal neuroendocrine tumor in which the regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed.  (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pNX TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Colorectal neuroendocrine tumor in which the regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed.  (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pN1 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pN1 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Colorectal neuroendocrine tumor with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pN1 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Colorectal neuroendocrine tumor with regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pN0 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pN0 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Colorectal neuroendocrine tumor without regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Colorectal Neuroendocrine Tumor pN0 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Colorectal neuroendocrine tumor without regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)
